answers.answer:
Individuals can offer help with food, products, clothing, transportation, or volunteer to support vulnerable people in Romania by selecting the "I want to help" option under "Offer support" or by providing resources through "Sprijin de Urgență".

To find detailed information, go to the website and look for the "Offer support" section, then click on "I want to help". Alternatively, visit the "Sprijin de Urgență" section and follow the instructions to request or provide resources from the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/sprijin.
